caption: Schema Extension
description: The OASF Schema Extension object provides dynamic descriptors for an agent. For example, security and categorization features can be described using extensions. The schema extensions are registered in the extensions.md file.
name: extension

name.description: The schema extension name. For example: dev.

annotations.caption: Annotations
annotations.description: Additional metadata associated with the extension.

version.caption: Version
version.description: The schema extension version. For example: 1.0.0-alpha.2.

specs.caption: Specification
specs.description: Generic specification schema of this extension.
